alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 9:50PM EST until March 02 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Heavy rain that fell last week, combined with expected rain this week, will cause the Patoka River to rise above flood stage at Princeton on Wednesday. THe river should remain in flood through the remainder of the week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY, MARCH 02... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Wednesday, March 02. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning to a crest of 19.7 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, March 02. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
